Package org.opentcs.access.rmi.services

Interface RemoteRouterService

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface RemoteRouterService
extends java.rmi.Remote
Declares the methods provided by the RouterService via RMI.

The majority of the methods declared here have signatures analogous to their counterparts in RouterService, with an additional ClientID parameter which serves the purpose of identifying the calling client and determining its permissions.

To avoid redundancy, the semantics of methods that only pass through their arguments are not explicitly documented here again. See the corresponding API documentation in RouterService for these, instead.

    void updatePathLock​(ClientID clientId, TCSObjectReference<Path> ref, boolean locked)  
    void updateRoutingTopology​(ClientID clientId)
